title: Any New York State Commission on Ethics documents that would pertain to the vetting of a William F. Howard for employment at SUNY or State of New York Dept. of Homeland Security or any other employment by State of New York.

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Any New York State Commission on Ethics documents that would pertain to the vetting of a William F. Howard for employment at SUNY or State of New York Dept. of Homeland Security or any other employment by State
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any New York State Commission on Ethics documents that would pertain to the vetting of a William F. Howard for employment at SUNY or State of New York Dept. of Homeland Security or any other employment by State of New York.  William F. Howard with alleged ties to Charles R. Longo Sr. and a Mark Cary and Gilbert Sapperstein. is a former employee of the Maryland Attorney General's office, under Joseph Curran Jr.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Don Stone

title: Any documents pertaining to any Florida Attorney General Investigation Into Ebay or Paypal for Discriminating Against Florida Residents Because of Their Politics.

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Any documents pertaining to any Florida Attorney General Investigation Into Ebay or Paypal for Discriminating Against Florida Residents Because of Their Politics.
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any documents pertaining to any Florida Attorney General Investigation into the internet platforms  Ebay or Paypal for discriminating against certain Florida residents because of their politics and blocking access to these platforms. My allegation is that both Ebay and Paypal are acting as agents for the State of Florida collecting and submitting sales tax to the State of Florida.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Don Stone
